subproject.description: Directorate for the Protection of the International Institutions (DPII) properly equipped and enabled to provide quality services to the UN system; improved mobility, responsiveness, operational efficiency and morale in the DPII force through required equipment and infrastructure. Further, Capacity of Ministry of Interior/DPII to provide training and appropriate policy/procedural direction to deployed DPII personnel.
subproject.gender code: No noticeable contribution to gender equality
subproject.title: Security Gap Project
